title: Bon Jovi - Sessions From The Vault (Disc 3) - 320kbps
description:
1. Bon Jovi - Stand Up [Basement Demo] 
2. Bon Jovi - Deep Cuts The Knife [Basement Demo] 
3. Bon Jovi - Wild In The Streets [Basement Demo] 
4. Bon Jovi - Never Say Goodbye [Basement Demo] 
5. Bon Jovi - Walk Don&#039;t Run [Basement Demo] 
6. Bon Jovi - Edge Of A Broken Heart [Basement Demo] 
7. Bon Jovi - Right Side [Basement Demo] 
8. Bon Jovi - The Promise [Basement Demo] 
9. Bon Jovi - Lonely Is The Night [Basement Demo] 
10. Bon Jovi - Raise Your Hands [Basement Demo] 
11. Bon Jovi - Take Me Home [Basement Demo] 
12. Bon Jovi - Never Enough [Basement Demo] 
13. Bon Jovi - Wanted Dead Or Alive [Basement Demo]

-This is the legendary Basement Sessions where Jon and Richie holed up in the Sambora family basement to write songs for the upcoming album, Slippery When Wet. These are very raw tracks with minimum input by the rest of the band.

This is another for the diehards only, I&#039;m afraid. Even I find it hard to listen to! For those of you only wanting the good studio demos, Sessions 5/8/9/10/11 are the best, so look out for them!
